home.title: Home | MirrorBuddy
home.description: Discover AI-powered learning for students with learning differences. Personalized tutoring with 26 maestros, voice interaction, and adaptive learning features.

settings.title: Settings | MirrorBuddy
settings.description: Customize your learning experience with accessibility profiles, character preferences, privacy controls, and account settings tailored to your specific needs.

aiTransparency.title: AI Transparency | MirrorBuddy
aiTransparency.description: Learn how MirrorBuddy uses AI responsibly, our transparency commitments, and how we ensure safe AI for student education with strong guardrails.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | MirrorBuddy
privacy.description: Understand how MirrorBuddy protects your data, respects GDPR, manages information securely, and ensures your privacy with encrypted communications.

terms.title: Terms of Service | MirrorBuddy
terms.description: Read our terms of service, user agreements, acceptable use policies, and legal information for using MirrorBuddy's educational platform and services.
